cards.caption: You don’t have to force what God has already placed in you. Let it flow. Your presence is a wellspring—refreshing others with grace, truth, and light.
You are covered. Even when storms rise, your shelter is divine. Rest in the shadow, and let your heart be still.
You were never meant to dim. Today, let your light speak—through advocacy, creativity, and holy fire. Chains break when you rise.
Silence is not absence—it’s presence. In the still, God whispers. Listen with your spirit, and let peace be your compass.
Nothing is wasted. Every scar, every silence, every setback—God is restoring it all. You are being rebuilt with beauty.
Delight is holy. Let joy be your worship today. Prepare your heart for rest, and let gratitude overflow.
You are not alone. God walks beside you—in every conversation, every breath, every moment. Let His presence be your peace.
